title: How much to charge custom font?
content:
my friend have a request to make a custom font?

how much he should charge it?

client drew letters so we need to digitalize it...  
how much would it cost? thanks!
author: garden

comments.content:
Format? Complete glyph set? Schedule? Complexity of design? Family Plan? Exclusivity

Those are the questions I ask before I quote.

\>my friend have a request to make a custom font?

Look in the 'release' forum, this subject has been covered a half dozen or so times.

Cheers, Si
